entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Becoming mainly cloudy this evening. Clearing before morning. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CDT Saturday 8 April 2023
